title: Blue-Green and Canary Deployments
content:
Module 8, Lesson 9: Blue-Green and Canary Deployments

Introduction

This lesson covers Blue-Green and Canary Deployments, a core topic in DevOps & Deployment. Mastering this area will help you build reliable, scalable, and maintainable web applications.

Key Concepts

1. Fundamentals

Understanding the foundational principles of Blue-Green and Canary Deployments ensures you can apply them correctly in a variety of real-world scenarios. Always prefer clarity over cleverness.

2. Practical Application

Theory must translate into working code. In DevOps & Deployment, every concept has direct practical implications for how you architect, test, and deploy applications.

3. Common Pitfalls

Awareness of common mistakes in Blue-Green and Canary Deployments helps you avoid costly bugs and security vulnerabilities. Review real-world examples and practise defensive coding techniques.

4. Best Practices

Industry best practices evolve constantly. Keep up with community standards, read production post-mortems, and participate in code reviews to sharpen your skills in DevOps & Deployment.

Summary

You have completed Blue-Green and Canary Deployments in Module 8. Continue to the next lesson to build further expertise in DevOps & Deployment.
